narrate.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to explain what is happening in a film or television programme as part of the film or programme
narrate.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a wildlife film narrated by David Attenborough
narrate.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to tell a story by describing all the events in order, for example in a book
narrate.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The main character narrates the story.
